content: catventurous crochet simple and fun crochet patterns the #fashionablycatventurous supermeowdel catventurer melba @catventurepussmelba welcome to this beginner-friendly video tutorial for our lavender of provence cat necktie thanks so much for watching and happy crocheting materials * yarn of your choice in 3 colours i used 3 weight cotton/rayon * crochet hook to suit your yarn i used 2 5mm * darning needle preferably with a sharp point * scissors * measuring tape optional stitches/techniques * slip knot onto hook * making a chain chain * slip_stitch sl st * single_crochet single_crochet * double_crochet double_crochet * picot * weaving in ends * basic hand sewing techniques **important these neckties are intended to be stylish and fun for you and your cat for their safety please supervise your cat at all times while they are wearing this necktie or any other item that secures around the neck or within which claws may become entangled **
